explains: n. （神话中有魔法的）小矮人；侏儒，矮子；矮星
v. 使显得矮小，使相形见绌
wordGroup: brown dwarf 棕矮星；褐矮星
red dwarf 红矮星（表面温度较低且亮度较弱的恒星）

sentences.en: He might have been called the invulnerable dwarf of the fray.
sentences.cn: 可以说，他是混战中的一个无懈可击的侏儒。

sentences.en: This was not the best of it; for the dwarf said, "I know thee."
sentences.cn: 这还不是最好的；因为小矮人说："我认识你。”

sentences.en: The dwarf said, "I come to talk with your father, not with you."
sentences.cn: 小矮人说：“我是来和你父亲谈的，不是来和你谈的。”
